<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>

---

Yes. I added a Netlify config so the build + SPA routing are ready.

Netlify config added in `netlify.toml` with:
- build command: `npm run build`
- publish dir: `dist`
- SPA redirect to `index.html`

Next steps (UI):
- Push this repo to GitHub/GitLab.
- In Netlify: “Add new site” → “Import an existing project”.
- Select the repo; Netlify will pick up `netlify.toml` automatically.
- Deploy.

Optional CLI:
- `npm i -g netlify-cli`
- `netlify login`
- `netlify init` (link to site)
- `netlify deploy --prod`

If you want, I can also add a `README` deploy section or wire up a custom domain.

---
